definition: to eat and drink/food and drink
variant of 吃[chi1]
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
to drink/variant of 嗬[he1]
to shout
to eat, drink and be merry (idiom)/to abandon oneself to a life of pleasure
to eat, drink, shit, piss, and sleep/(fig.) the ordinary daily routine
to go dining, wining, whoring and gambling/to lead a life of dissipation

sentences.english: You truly are eating and drinking for two.
sentences.chinese: 你是真正地一人吃喝养两个。

sentences.english: He could kill and then sit down and eat.
sentences.chinese: 杀人后他仍面不改容立刻坐下吃喝。

sentences.english: He never stinted himself in food.
sentences.chinese: 他在吃喝上从不怕多花钱。

sentences.english: Life is not all beer and skittles, still love.
sentences.chinese: 生活并非只是吃喝玩乐，还有恋爱。

sentences.english: Life is not all cakes and ale.
sentences.chinese: 人生并不就是吃喝玩乐。

sentences.english: However, I have a barn full of animals that supply me with all the food I need.
sentences.chinese: 但我得谷仓里注满了动物，让我吃喝不用愁。

sentences.english: Life is not all beer and skittles .
sentences.chinese: 人生并不完全是吃喝玩乐。

sentences.english: Cor. 11:22 Do you not have houses to eat and drink in?
sentences.chinese: 林前十一22你们要吃喝，难道没有家么？

sentences.english: Mark is really sitting pretty with his new job.
sentences.chinese: 马克的新工作使他的生活吃喝不愁。

sentences.english: All he does is eat, sleep and poop.
sentences.chinese: 他所有会做的就是吃喝拉撒睡。

sentences.english: His  spirit was vitiated by pleasure seeking.
sentences.chinese: 他的志气因追求吃喝玩乐而消磨殆尽。

sentences.english: So the two of them sat down to eat and drink together.
sentences.chinese: 于是二人坐下一同吃喝。

sentences.english: And when David had called him, he did eat and drink before him;
sentences.chinese: 大卫召了乌利亚来，叫他在自己面前吃喝，使他喝醉。

sentences.english: If the dead are not raised, let us eat and drink, for tomorrow we die.
sentences.chinese: 若死人不复活，我们就吃吃喝喝吧，因为明天要死了。

sentences.english: Eating, drinking and -- not unusual in Tokyo -- makingmerry are all well represented.
sentences.chinese: 尽情地吃喝享乐皆不为怪，东京就是这样一个城市。

sentences.english: These breaks are not only for eating and drinking but also for chatting.
sentences.chinese: 这些休息时段不只是吃吃喝喝而已，也是用来闲聊的。

definition: to eat and drink as much as one likes/to make a pig of oneself
food and clothing
to eat and drink gluttonously/to pig out
to stuff oneself with food
to play around/to disport oneself
to eat, drink and be merry (idiom)/to abandon oneself to a life of pleasure
to have three meals a day
to have a meal/to eat/to make a living
to enjoy life/pleasures of life
food/edibles
to eat (of bird or animal)/to feed
to eat, drink, shit, piss, and sleep/(fig.) the ordinary daily routine
to spend (money)/expenses
to eat one's fill
clothing, food, housing and transport (idiom); people's basic needs
to have enough food and warm clothes/adequately provided
to eat out/to eat at a restaurant
